text: Bhawani Prasad Khapung (born 5 October 1961) is a Nepalese politician who is presently the Minister of Health and Population in the ruling coalition led by Prime Minister and Nepali Congress President Sher Bahadur Deuba. In the 2017 General Election, he was elected to the House of Representatives as a Member of Parliament (MP) from Terathum 1 (constituency). He is a CPN member (Unified Socialist). ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Bhawani Prasad Khapung
